tool.name: SAGA.pointcloud_tools.7
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False isArrayFIELDS False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT name SAGA.pointcloud_tools.7 INPUT $INPUT FIELDS $FIELDS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Input
param.help: Point cloud to drop attribute(s) from. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-lasf

param.name: FIELDS
param.label: Attributes
param.help: The attribute field(s) to drop. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: The tool can be used to drop attributes from a point cloud. In case the output dataset is not set, the attribute(s) will be dropped from the input dataset, i.e. the input dataset will be overwritten.<br/><br/>
